title: One Piece Diaries #26: 'Davy Back Fight' Arc
author: ComicCon.com
description: A review of the Davy Back Fight arc noting that while it's not a popular arc amongst One Piece fans, some people love it.

author: CBR

title: One Piece: In Defense of the Davy Back Fight Arc
author: CBR
description: A defense piece arguing for the merits of the Davy Back Fight arc despite its unpopularity among fans.

title: Comfort Food Comics: One Piece Davy Back Fight Arc
author: Maddie (@othatsraspberry)
description: A positive review describing the Davy Back Fight as one of the author's favorite arcs to return to, perfectly sandwiched between Skypiea and Water 7/Enies Lobby.

title: Noro Noro no Mi Explained: Eiichiro Oda Gave This Paramecia Devil Fruit Broken Powers but It Has a Lot of Flaws
author: Fandom Wire
description: Article analyzing how the Noro Noro no Mi has dangerous potential but is limited by Foxy being a terrible antagonist and the fruit having exploitable weaknesses.
